analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#629-633) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#632)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#372-381) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#376)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#386-396) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#392-396)

TezaCrowdsale._preValidatePurchase (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#1024-1030) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > openingTime + (1555200) && block.timestamp <= openingTime + (3196800) (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#1029-1030)
	- block.timestamp <= openingTime + (1555200) (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol#1027-1030)
	- block.timestamp >= openingTime + (6652800) && block.timestamp <= openingTime + (9331200) (/unique_chucks/21/0x62aeabf864e320eac39e1c8a302fc13a6204212e.sol)
